hero.title: Studio Cauris
hero.description: I'm a passionate graphic designer with 5+ years of experience creating compelling visual identities, digital experiences, and print designs that help brands stand out and connect with their audience.

portfolio.title: Featured Projects
portfolio.description: Explore a selection of my recent work spanning brand identity, web design, mobile interfaces, and print campaigns.

brandIdentity.title: Brand Identity Design
brandIdentity.description: Complete brand identity package for a tech startup including logo, color palette, typography, and brand guidelines.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Website Design
ecommerce.description: Modern and user-friendly e-commerce website design with focus on conversion optimization and mobile experience.

mobileApp.title: Mobile App Interface
mobileApp.description: Clean and intuitive mobile app interface design for a fitness tracking application with custom iconography.

printCampaign.title: Print Campaign Design
printCampaign.description: Creative print advertising campaign for a luxury fashion brand including posters, brochures, and magazine ads.

packaging.title: Packaging Design
packaging.description: Sustainable packaging design for organic food products with eco-friendly materials and modern aesthetics.

socialMedia.title: Social Media Graphics
socialMedia.description: Cohesive social media graphics package for a lifestyle brand including templates, stories, and post designs.

contact.title: Ready to Start Your Next Project?
contact.description: I'm always excited to work on new creative challenges. Let's discuss how we can bring your vision to life with compelling design solutions.
